### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Steam Engine System at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Steam Engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5) with no input liquid
-  Small Electric Pole (position x=119.5, y=-30.5)
-  Pipe Group (fluid system 142417) with pipes at positions (x=111.5, y=-33.5), (x=112.5, y=-33.5), (x=113.5, y=-33.5), (x=115.5, y=-33.5), (x=116.5, y=-33.5), (x=117.5, y=-33.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using inserters
-  Ensure that the inserter has enough fuel to operate
-  Make sure that the inserter is not blocked by items on the ground and has a sink entity to accept the output

### Errors when using boilers
-  Ensure that the boiler has enough fuel to operate
-  Make sure that the boiler is connected to a steam engine or other entity that can use the steam output

### Errors when using steam engines
-  Ensure that the steam engine has an input liquid (water or steam) to operate
-  Make sure that the steam engine is connected to a boiler or other entity that can provide the input liquid

### NAMESPACE
-  No utility functions have been defined by the agent
-  No important variables have been assigned by the agent
